description: Doc should mention that only provider network is configurable directly with some changes in vCenter like mentioning the creation of bridge steps. And the ways to use the self-service network with vCenter as a compute like NSX, openvswitch etc. and how to do it.
title: VMware vSphere in Configuration Reference
